parameters.query:
SELECT 
  c.*,
  s.fixed_component,
  s.variable_component,
  s.basic_salary,
  s.hra,
  s.other_allowances,
  s.pf_amount,
  s.esi_eligible,
  s.esi_amount,
  s.gross_salary,
  s.net_salary,
  s.gratuity,
  s.flexi_benefits,
  s.total_annual_performance_incentive,
  s.pf_company_contribution,
  s.annual_ctc
FROM onboarding.candidates c
LEFT JOIN onboarding.salary_structures s ON c.candidate_id = s.candidate_id
--WHERE c.id =1158
WHERE c.id = {{ $json.id }};
--WHERE c.id =  {{ $json.chatInput }};

parameters.query:
UPDATE onboarding.candidates
SET 
  templates = jsonb_set(
      templates::jsonb,
      '{offer_letter_generated}',
      'true'::jsonb,
      false
  ),
  offer_letter_file_name = '{{ $('to pdf1').item.json.pdfPath }}',
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = {{ $('Combined Data Query4').item.json.id }}
RETURNING id, offer_letter_file_name;
